name: Canopy Coverage
functionStatement: Shade, solar input, and groundwater keep temperature and light within natural ranges for stream metabolism and dissolved oxygen.
descriptionMarkdown: Riparian canopy cover that controls shading and thermal/light regime in the channel.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Riparian/Channel

Method: Field and/or Desktop
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure percent canopy cover over the channel and near banks along the reach; score using SQT thresholds for the appropriate region/vegetation setting.
